Name: I am Bjorn : Escape Room
About the game: The clock is ticking, you have 1 hourâ€¦Can you free Bjorn from his imprisoned mind? Find yourself in his deepest memory within his childhood room solving puzzles and unlocking clues to defeat his lifelong struggles. There are sights and sounds to be discovered that will reveal the past. Pick up and examine almost everything and listen CLOSELY to what Bjorn thinks about each object. Do you have what it takes to help Bjorn figure out who he is?
